name: Berry Global Group, Inc.
description: Berry Global Group, Inc. is a leading global supplier of innovative packaging and protective solutions. Founded in 1967 and based in Evansville, Indiana, Berry Global operates over 170 manufacturing facilities worldwide. The company specializes in producing a wide range of products, including flexible and rigid packaging, nonwoven fabrics, and specialty films. Berry's products serve various industries including food and beverage, healthcare, personal care, and industrial markets. With a strong focus on sustainability, Berry Global is committed to reducing plastic waste and enhancing the recyclability of its products through innovative design and material choices. The company aims to create solutions that not only meet customer needs but also contribute positively to the environment. Berry Global's mission is to provide customers with the highest quality products while striving to make a positive impact on the planet. The company’s robust research and development capabilities enable it to stay at the forefront of industry trends, ensuring it meets the evolving demands of its customers. Berry Global is recognized for its commitment to corporate social responsibility, focusing on sustainability initiatives and community engagement.
